channel.title: Luckscape v2 client help
channel.description:
Hey guys,
i just joined the forums and thought i could get some help.
i recently downloaded the luckscape v2 source which is great for me to work on! but the problem is i downloaded the cache and source but the client link is broken no matter where i look.. i would appreciate it if someone could upload the client for me.
also is there anyway i can use another client and edit it somehow so that i can use the luckscape v2 source on it?
i cant use any general 317 client as this source has customs.
any help would be greatly appreciated. thanks a lot.
